Interface TagReader

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, Device, SonarObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
TagReaderImpl
public interface TagReader extends Device
A tag reader is a sensor for vehicle transponders, which are used for toll lanes.
Author:
Douglas Lau
